briefTitle: STI.VI. Study: How to Improve Lifestyles in Screening Contexts
officialTitle: Pilot RCT on Lifestyles Impact on Health Outcomes in the General Population Invited to Mammography and Colorectal Cancer Screening Programmes. (STI.li di VI.ta - Lifestyles) STI.VI.
conditions: Lifestyle Risk Reduction, Weight Changes, Body, Breast Cancer, Colorectal Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* 49 to 55-year-old women invited to mammography screening,
* 58 to 61 year-old people (both sexes) invited to colorectal screening

Exclusion Criteria:

* psychiatric disorders,
* disabling disease
* life expectancy \<6 months
* eating or deambulation disorders
* in physiotherapy at the time of recruitment.
